description:
Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented Service Manager (Spring Boot)

Filter by datasource/namespace/node.

panels.description: Description of dashboard

options.content:
# Database Performance Dashboard

**Team**: SaaS  
**Service**: Service Manager (Spring Boot)  
**Aim**: Monitor database connection pool, Hibernate performance, and cache usage to ensure optimal database interaction and minimize latency.

---

## **Key Metrics**
- **HikariCP Active Connections**: Active connections in the HikariCP pool.
- **HikariCP Idle Connections**: Idle connections in the HikariCP pool.
- **HikariCP Connection Usage**: Percentage of HikariCP pool usage.
- **Hibernate Open Sessions**: Active Hibernate sessions.
- **Hibernate Query Execution Time**: Average time to execute Hibernate queries.
- **Hibernate Cache Hits/Misses**: Cache hit and miss rates.

---

## **Filters**
- **Namespace**: Narrow down metrics for specific namespace.

panels.title: Dashboard Info

targets.expr: count(kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"sf-service-manager.*"})

panels.description: The average number of active connections in the HikariCP connection pool.

panels.description: The average time (in seconds) spent waiting to new connection from the HikariPool-1 pool.

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"sf-service-manager-.*", pool=~"HikariPool-1"}[5m]) 
/ 
avg_over_time(hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"sf-service-manager-.*", pool=~"HikariPool-1"}[5m])
* on (namespace, pod, container) group_left(uid)
kube_pod_container_info{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"sf-service-manager-.*"}
* on (namespace, pod) group_left(pod_ip)
kube_pod_info{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"sf-service-manager-.*"}
